desc: Curated and Company specializes in selling vintage and antique items curate in house. We offer blue and white porcelain, blue willow, Staffordshire pottery and figurines, rose medallion, Minton china, chinoiserie, Chinese porcelain, lamps, brass, double happiness, milk glass, foo dogs, Turkish rugs, & more.
